info.description: This is the API documentation for Campwiz
info.title: Campwiz API

parameters.description: Whether the campaign is closed (result have been finalized)
parameters.name: isClosed

parameters.description:
Whether the campaign is hidden from the public list
If isHidden is true, then projectID is required
parameters.name: isHidden

parameters.description:
This projectID is the project that campaigns belong to.then ProjectID is required
		If the person is not an admin, then the project ID must match the project ID of the user
parameters.name: projectId

post.description: Create a new round for a campaign
The user would provide a round ID and a list of commons categories and the system would import images from those categories
Update the details of a round
post.summary: Update the details of a round

get.description: Get the next public submission for a jury
The task represents a background job that can be run by the system
The task represents a background job that can be run by the system. This endpoint streams the response
get.summary: Get a task by ID but stream the response

x-enum-comments.PermissionGroupCoordinator: see the evaluation results of the evaluations they have done
x-enum-comments.PermissionGroupJury: see the evaluation results of the evaluations they have done

campaignId.description: A unique identifier for the campaign, it should be custom defined

createdAt.description: The time the campaign was created, it would be set automatically

isPublic.description: Whether the campaign is shown in the public list

campaignId.description: A unique identifier for the campaign, it should be custom defined

createdAt.description: The time the campaign was created, it would be set automatically

isPublic.description: Whether the campaign is shown in the public list

url.description: The URL of the project's website

assignmentCount.description: The number of times the submission has been assigned to the juries

author.description: The Actual Author in the Wikimedia

evaluationCount.description: The number of times the submission has been evaluated by the juries

score.description: The Average Score of the submission

submittedById.description: The User who submitted the article on behalf of the participant

isPublic.description: Whether the campaign is shown in the public list
Whether the campaign is shown in the public list

categories.description: Categories from which images will be fetched
